content.text:
Hello! I'm Claude Code, ready to help you explore and plan solutions for your codebase.

I can see this is a Git repository with some untracked files and directories. To get started effectively, I should understand what we're working with here.

Let me first explore the structure of your project:

<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">find /app -type f -name "*.json" -o -name "*.md" -o -name "*.txt" | head -20</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">ls -la /app/</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">if [ -f /app/package.json ]; then cat /app/package.json; elif [ -f /app/pyproject.toml ]; then cat /app/pyproject.toml; elif [ -f /app/Cargo.toml ]; then cat /app/Cargo.toml; fi</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>

I'm ready to help you with any planning or exploration tasks. What would you like me to work on? Some things I can help with:

- **Explore the codebase** to understand architecture and patterns
- **Design implementation plans** for new features
- **Analyze existing code** to identify patterns and conventions
- **Create detailed strategies** for implementing requirements
- **Identify dependencies** and sequencing for complex changes

Please share your requirements or what you'd like me to plan, and I'll dive into the codebase to create a detailed implementation strategy!
